skins.shipDescription: Colorado class battleship¡ª West Virginia, hull number BB-48.
skins.selfIntroduction: During a "Naval Holiday", my sisters and I were honored amongst the world's strongest battleships. We were granted the high-profile title of - BIG SEVEN. Although times are changing, the three of us still have the strength to fight any enemy fleet in a decisive battle, please don't forget that.
skins.acquisition: It¡¯s finally my time to show my strength... Under the guidance of fate, the third ship of Colorado class, West Virginia, reporting in.
skins.login: You¡¯re late... the exercise has already begun, hurry!
skins.details: Do not doubt my combat performance, Commander.
skins.secretaryIdle1: The combat exercise didn¡¯t go well¡­ Is the Commander being lazy again?
skins.secretaryIdle2: I will never forget the humiliation I suffered on that day.
skins.secretaryIdle3: On the night of the Surigao Strait, I witnessed the last moments of the Sakura Empire fleet... They truly are a worthy opponent...
skins.secretaryTouch: This should be... a friendly gesture I suppose.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, it seems you¡¯re rather close to getting lectured by me.
